about_the_game:
A fresh RPG combining school management and hero training!!

Embark on an epic quest to challenge the mighty Demon Lord and restore peace to the world alongside the heroes you've nurtured at your academy. In Hero Academy Legacy, strategy, training, and adventure seamlessly blend together. Forge your own legend in this unique RPG!

■Story

A world devastated by the defeat of the Demon Lord. People are suffering from a curse that renders them powerless. In such a time, by the grace of the goddess, growth becomes possible for only three years. With hope in their hearts, the Hero Academy is established. As a former hero who was defeated by the Demon Lord, you are chosen to be the principal of the academy. Develop the school, train talented students, and take on the mission to defeat the Demon Lord. An epic adventure unfolds to save the world. What surprising fate awaits you……!?

■System

Engage in strategic and intense turn-based command battles! Students can use not only weapon attacks but also various skills and magic with different effects based on their jobs and training. Use the experience points and gold acquired from defeated monsters to strengthen your students and develop your school.

  • Attributes

    Students, enemies, and skills/magic have attributes. Choose advantageous attributes to gain the upper hand in battle!

  • Death

    If a student is defeated at the end of battle, there is a high probability that they will die. When their life is in danger, retreat!

Choose cards to decide your class curriculum. The experience points and amounts obtained will vary depending on the curriculum! Events can also occur based on the squares you land on, so pay attention to the number of days you progress. Acquire cards and find your own efficient training methods!

  • Teachers

    By hiring teachers, you can obtain cards or have teachers teach your students the skills, magic, and abilities they possess. The more capable the teacher, the higher their monthly salary, so manage your budget when hiring.

  • Facilities

    Operating facilities allows you to obtain cards. During operation, training is boosted! Purchase based on the stats you wish to enhance.

  • Shop

    Due to the devastated world, there is nothing initially for sale... Enter dungeons to obtain items and sell them at pawn shops. Items sold will be displayed in the store! Items obtained in dungeons are valuable in this world and can be sold at high prices, so aim for the items you acquire!

Students enter the academy with jobs. Different jobs have different stats that grow more easily! Train according to each student's individuality and the dungeons you want to tackle.

  • Warrior

    Role: Tank

    A reliable tank whose HP and defense grow easily. Place them in the front lines to attract attacks.

  • Martial Artist

    Role: Physical Attacker

    An attacker with physical attack power and speed that grow easily.

  • Thief

    Role: Status Ailment Caster

    A user of status ailments with high speed and luck growth. Use "Steal" to efficiently gather items!

  • Clown

    Role: Debuffer

    A debuffer with high luck growth. Basic stats other than luck are generally low.

  • Mage

    Role: Magic Attacker

    An attacker with magic attack power that grows easily. Controls all attribute attacks. Rich in area-of-effect attacks.

  • Priest

    Role: Healer

    A healer with magic defense that grows easily. Skilled in HP recovery and status ailment recovery.

  • Hero

    Role: Legend

    All stats grow easily. A prodigy that appears once every 10 years.
